attributes.action: KEEP GYMS OPEN DURING LOCKDOWN - NORTHERN IRELAND
attributes.additional_details: Reconsider opening the gyms during lockdown. Strict measures are already adhered to, and given the weather at this time of year too, would provide a way for people to still get regular exercise.
attributes.background: Gyms play a significant role in assisting with mental health issues, stress, asides from the obvious benefits to physical wellbeing & overall health. Gyms in Northern Ireland have taken every measure possible to adhere to advisory guidelines & rules, ensuring the risk of transfer is extremely low.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for.

If you want to raise this issue you could contact your MLA, or raise it with the Northern Ireland Executive.

You can find contact details for your MLAs here: http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/your-mlas/

You can find contact details for the departments of the Northern Ireland Executive here: https://www.nidirect.gov.uk/contacts/government-departments-in-northern-ireland
